title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
hi, this board came in, with problem not charging, board run off battery and detect the battery.

ppbus is 12.2v.
isl is a bit botched, so i replace it.
i replaced smc, still the same.
i tried the previous smc to another working board. i have 12.6v ppbus.

i diode mode pad under smc and found out that smbus_smc_bsa_scl is open.
so i wire it to r5281, but ppbus is still 12.2v.
smc_reset_l is present at 3.3v, but should i make sure its reaching the pad under smc ?

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
Did you check SCL/SDA voltage and diode mode?
Remove D6950 and test again.
Also disconnect BIL (J6955).

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
both diode mode is the same at 0.460, and have 3.4v.
d6950 removed and still the same.
i test all above without bil too.

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
If you get same diode mode reading on both line, I doubt to have bad solders, or broken traces under SMC; unless both lines broken.
Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.
Be sure Q7055 is good; also check all traces in that area.

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
its 3.5 ohm and 20.5 ohm.

q7055 and the traces are good...
i have measured smc_Reset_l is getting to the pad under smc.

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
Try changing U7000 now.
Be sure R7000 is good.

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
change u7000 and r7000 resistance is good. but still 12.26v ppbus :(
magsafe light is orange instead of green, is it normal ?

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
Fan runs with normal speed?
Be sure the machine turns on in normal mode.
If it turns on in SMC bypass mode, PPBUS_G3H will remain 12.2V.

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
when this came in board turn on, theres a jumper wire from one of the six traces beside c4905, if forget which one ( not present in boardview ), i remove the wire and intend to redo all of the work.
but when i test it now, only fan spin ( normal speed ), but no brain / capslock / usb activity, but seeing ppbus is 12.2v, i focus on that first.

title: 820-2879-b not charging.
message:
Maybe SMC doesn't work properly because of other problem.
Be sure all original traces are good.
